# Pano Publisher

Pano Publisher is a local-first web application for uploading individual 360° photo spheres to Google Maps and Google Street View.

## Purpose
- Upload standalone 360° photo spheres (equirectangular panoramas) to Google Street View
- Fill the gap left by the discontinued Google Street View mobile app
- Focus on image uploads only

## Key Characteristics
- Local-first processing in the browser
- No proprietary user accounts
- Uses Google account only for publishing via Google APIs
- Free to use
- Open source
- Modern, clean and fast user interface

## Data Handling
- No server-side storage of images
- All image processing happens locally in the browser
- Images are sent only to Google APIs for publishing
- Location search requests are sent directly from the client to external geocoding services but only when used

## Limitations
- No video uploads
- No connected panoramas
- No street-level imagery from video footage

## Important Pages
- /        Main application
- /privacy Privacy policy
- /faq     Frequently asked questions
